jobs.name: nightly-tests
jobs.description: Run full test suite and report failures
jobs.command: exec npm test 2>&1 || exec python -m pytest 2>&1

jobs.name: dep-audit-weekly
jobs.description: Dependency security audit (npm audit + pip audit)
jobs.command: exec npm audit --audit-level=high 2>&1; exec pip audit 2>&1 || true

jobs.name: cost-summary-daily
jobs.description: Token usage and cost summary from tracking logs

jobs.name: heartbeat
jobs.description: Health check: git status, tests, deps, disk usage
jobs.command: exec bash -c 'echo "=== GIT STATUS ==="; git status --short; echo "=== QUICK TEST ==="; npm test 2>&1 | tail -5 || python -m pytest --tb=no -q 2>&1 | tail -5; echo "=== DISK ==="; df -h / | tail -1'
